meaning: You're operating at a high level, driving flows end-to-end. The next step is sharpening strategy, systems thinking, and mentorship.
dayToDayReality: Owns complex, multi-screen flows from discovery to launch.
Works closely with PMs on problem framing and success metrics.
Leads design reviews and provides strategic direction.
Mentors junior designers and helps level up the team.
Makes trade-off decisions balancing user needs, business goals, and technical constraints.
commonMistakes: Focusing only on craft without developing strategic thinking.
Not investing time in mentorship and team growth.
Working in isolation instead of building cross-functional partnerships.
Not documenting systems, patterns, or processes for others to learn from.
nextGrowthFocus: Develop product strategy skills: roadmaps, prioritization, and business impact.
Build design systems or establish design ops practices.
Take on larger scope: entire product areas or cross-functional initiatives.
Improve communication and influence with stakeholders and leadership.
